mapper.insert: MERGE INTO cart_tbl USING DUAL ON (mbsp_id = #{mbsp_id} AND pro_num = #{pro_num}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET cart_amount = cart_amount + #{cart_amount} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (cart_code, pro_num, mbsp_id, cart_amount) VALUES (seq_cart_code.NEXTVAL, #{pro_num}, #{mbsp_id}, #{cart_amount})
mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_code, c.pro_num, c.mbsp_id, c.cart_amount, p.pro_up_folder, p.pro_img, p.pro_price, p.pro_name FROM cart_tbl c INNER JOIN product_tbl p ON c.pro_num = p.pro_num WHERE c.mbsp_id = #{mbsp_id}
